Name: Tap Sword - Black Smith
About the game: I made it because I was curious about the limit of my patience. Strengthen the sword at the right time. If the timing is off, the reinforcement slides. You can check other people's skills online. Try to strengthen it. I don't think you'll be able to strengthen 100 if I'm right. LOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL
